 IMPORTANT: Domain Name Transfer

You will have to point your domain name to our nameservers yourself. We will send you an email with instructions on how to do that.
To add more domains you can use the addon domain manager in cPanel.
If you don't have a domain name yet and want to register one by yourself, do it now. (Link opens in a new tab)

 Primary Domain Setup

You will have a one-click install script at your disposal to get Ghost up and running.
